name: GetPaymentLinkLineItems
description:
Retrieve the line items for a specific payment link.

Use this tool to get the line items associated with a specific payment link from Stripe. It provides the initial set of line items and a URL for the full list if needed.

parameters.name: payment_link_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the payment link whose line items need to be retrieved.

parameters.name: pagination_ending_before
parameters.description: An object ID that serves as a pagination cursor to fetch the previous page of the list.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: A list of fields in the response that should be expanded for more detailed information.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: item_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of line items to retrieve, ranging from 1 to 100. Default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after
parameters.description: An object ID used as a cursor to fetch the next page of the list when paginating. Use the ID of the last object from the previous response.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.
